name: Space Elevators
description:
NOTE : Don't forget to read the 'How To' section in-game, this game is pretty confusing at first ;)

The alien invasion is upon us! They're mean, green, and have too much firepower for us to fight back! Humanity's last hope is to build a giant spaceship and get everybody out of here asap!

You're the only one to have the smarts to create such a thing. You'll need plenty of resources to complete a project that big - however, thanks to the marvels of modern technology, hopping to neighboring planets to get stuff is but a space-elevator-ride away.

So : get resources, build that ship, and get us away before we'e all incinerated. Our fates depend on you, pal.

Controls :

  • Mouse left click - menus, move camera, deactivate planet menuMouse left click + drag - create an elevator
  • space - center on main planet
  • p - pause

Made for Ludum Dare 30, with ActionScript 3 and the Flixel library
